title: Mixed-Methods-Based Pedagogical Workshop for Training Designer Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary education experience and basic pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: For corporate program managers overseeing social studies-linked education, strengthening competency in designing learner-participatory classes beyond traditional lecture-based instruction

learning_goals: Participating teachers can explain at least ten core knowledge areas required for transitioning to an instructional designer role.
Learners can derive lesson improvement plans by applying mixed research methods (surveys and focus group interviews).
Learners can improve their lesson design plans developed through project-based assessment by over 80% based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
